title: 【荃灣區示威者堵塞楊屋道和德士古道】於短時間內清場。

replies.msg:
【荃灣區示威者堵塞楊屋道和德士古道】
於今天下午荃灣區的公眾活動，有激進示威者在楊屋道和德士古道拆毁鐵欄, 以水馬, 竹枝及雪糕筒等雜物設置路障，罔顧市民及道路使用者的安全，並令附近一帶交通非常擠塞。
警方警告示威者立即停止所有違法行為，並呼籲在場其他人士立即離開，將會於短時間內清場。警方對示威者一切暴力行為，予以譴責。

A large public order event is underway in Tsuen Wan this afternoon. Some radical protestors have removed railings from Yeung Uk Street and Texaco Road, and set up barricades with water-filled barriers, bamboo sticks, traffic cones, and other objects. Such acts neglect the safety of citizens and road users, paralysing traffic in the vicinity.
The Police warn the protestors concerned to stop all illegal acts and appeal to everyone on site to leave immediately. The Police will soon conduct a dispersal operation and condemn all violent acts of protestors.
